sections.objective:
Enthusiastic Pharmacist with a variety of experience in community pharmacy including compounding and managerial experience.Â Enjoys
multitasking by working with other healthcare professionals and insurance providers to ensure optimal patient outcomes.Â Thrives on working in a
team environment to provide an efficient and positive patient experience.
Licenses
In good standing with both Texas and Idaho State Boards of Pharmacy and a certified immunizer.
